definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

sentences.english: Magna would also likely use Opel as a kind of automaking outsourcer, producing cars on contract for other brands.
sentences.chinese: 麥格納還可能用歐寶做汽車外包，生產其他汽車品牌。
1899年的今天，德國歐寶汽車生產出第一輛汽車。

sentences.english: But beyond that its future is bleak.
sentences.chinese: 但是大選之後，歐寶的前途渺茫。

sentences.english: 'We cannot have an Opel that is chronically unprofitable, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 阿克森說，我們不能要一個長期不盈利的歐寶。

sentences.english: Specialized in supplying full range of Skoda, Ford, Benz, Opel spare parts.
sentences.chinese: 主要出口斯柯達，福特，奔馳，歐寶的全車件。

sentences.english: Opel will unveil the station wagon version of its new Insignia upper-medium car.
sentences.chinese: 歐寶將推出旅行車版本的新徽章上中型汽車。
